title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2013 - Omaha, NE / Council Bluffs, IA, USA
description:
Have a passion for programming or testing?  Come meet new people like you and challenge yourself to think in new ways as you improve your testing, problem solving, and pair programming skills!  Programmers, testers, teachers, and students are all welcome!  Lunch and light breakfast will be provided. 
IMPORTANT DRIVING DIRECTIONS: 
Due to having graduation on campus on Saturday, December 14, please enter the campus from Highway 6 to avoid traffic congestion. Please park in Lot 28, just outside of Fremont Hall, where the activity is happening. 
IWCC Map for Code Retreat.docx (http://api.ning.com/files/U7YWT3FNhpys8I4Sx1JMKOoE3-gRt8tw70XkebUXq9OpWA-SF96rPRROAomMKfzP1QifixfJMJg-5nfkIC6ahg6T5eLC7pK2/IWCCMapforCodeRetreat.docx) 
Schedule: 
8:00am-8:30am Breakfast - Burrito Bar plus fruit, hashbrown casserole, mini-cinnamon roll, and coffee
 8:30am Introduction/Explanation of the day
 9:00am Session 1
 10:00am Session 2
 11:00am Session 3
 Noon Lunch from Paradise Biryani - vegetarian and chicken curries, rice, naan
 1:30pm Session 4
 2:30pm Session 5
 3:30pm Session 6
 4:30pm End of Event 
Soda and snacks will also be provided! 
 
What to bring: 
Optional:  Laptop 
Good to Have:  Notebook and writing utensil 
Required:  A desire to learn and try new things! 
http://archive.coderetreat.org/events/global-day-of-coderetreat-2013-omaha-ne-council-bluffs-ia-usa
